head.title: Almost Marie Callendar's Potato Cheese Soup

directions.step:
Place potatoes, onions, celery, and salt in the 4 c of water in a large pot. Simmer about 15 minutes until vegetables are tender. Put in blender and puree until chunky. Return soup to pot and add half-and-half, butter, and cheese. Simmer until hot. Do NOT Boil. Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #177
Date: Wed, 31 Jul 1996 07:31:04 -0700 (PDT)
From: PatH <phannema@wizard.ucr.edu> NOTES : "Rita Y. of Mira Loma has used this recipe for some time and finds this makes a very good soup. Michael S. of Murrieta sent in the same recipe."
